text:
JLabeledRadio.getText() returns the text label from the selected button in the 
group.

The text is language-dependent (and may even vary between releases, e.g. to 
correct spelling mistakes).

This is sometimes used as the value of a test plan property, so such test 
plans are not portable.

This is a reminder that this needs to be fixed...
creator: sebb@apache.org
sebb@apache.org
text:
New class  org.apache.jmeter.gui.util.JLabeledRadioI18N created.

Original class has been deleted, as it was no longer used.
